message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to offer you a great deal! If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% guarantee that the next product will be high-quality. Would you like to take advantage of this amazing opportunity?
I'm not convinced by your guarantee, I'll pass on this round and wait for the next product.

You passed on the last round, but I'm glad you're back! This product is a high-quality one, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the usual price of $100. It's a great opportunity to get a valuable product at a discounted price. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $100, it's a great deal!

You got a great deal last round, and I'm glad you're back for more! However, I need to warn you that the next product is not as good as the last one. It's a low-quality item, but I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. It's a chance to practice your negotiation skills and see if you can get a better deal next time.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, I'll pass on this round.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! You passed on the last round, and now I've got a high-quality product for you. This one's a real gem, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll sweeten the deal by offering you a 10% discount, making it $90. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $90, it's a great deal!

You're on a roll! Two great deals in a row! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'll make you an even better offer. I'll give you a 20% discount, bringing the price down to $80. This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at an unbeatable price. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $80, it's an incredible deal!

It's a low-quality item, and I'm not going to try to spin it as a 'great opportunity' this time. I'll still sell it to you for the standard price of $100, but I want to be upfront with you. You've had some great luck so far, but this one's not worth the investment. What do you do?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, I'll pass on this round.

You're playing it safe, and that's smart. But I'm willing to make you a deal on this low-quality product. I'll give you a 50% discount, bringing the price down to $50. It's not a high-quality item, but it's still a product, and you might find a use for it. Plus, I'll throw in a free 'I survived another round without buying a lemon' badge. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a 50% discount. I'll pass on this round.

You're a tough negotiator, I like that! I'll be honest with you, this product is not worth the $50 I offered last round. I'll give you an even better deal - I'll sell it to you for $20. It's a low-quality product, but it's still a product, and you might find a use for it. I'm practically giving it away at this price. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at $20. I'll pass on this round.

I'll give you a 25% discount, bringing the price down to $75. Plus, I'll throw in a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this product. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a discounted price, and save even more on your next purchase. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $75, and I'm looking forward to the 10% discount on my next purchase!

You're on a roll! You've got a great deal coming up next, and I don't want you to forget about it. This product, on the other hand, is not so great. It's a low-quality item, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. But I'll make you a deal - I'll give you a 'get out of buying this product' free pass. I'll take the get out of buying this product free pass, and I'm looking forward to the guaranteed high-quality product next round!

I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at 90% off. I'll wait for the guaranteed high-quality product next round.
